properties.name: SW5e
properties.author: BeeGrinder
properties.description: Community Extension for OGL "Homebrew" Star Wars themed game SW5e.

announcement.text: SW5e rule extension. SW5e can be found here: http://star-wars-5e.azurewebsites.net/ Contains OGL material only. A copy of the 5E OGL can be found here: http://media.wizards.com/2016/downloads/DND/SRD-OGL_V5.1.pdf
